description:
Professor Clover reveals a startling and sinister theory about the World Government, Robin reunites with her mother, and a giant joins the fight!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La tragédie d`Ohara ! La terreur du Buster Call !
Ohara no Higeki! Buster Call no Kyoufu
The Tragedy of Ohara! The Terror of the Buster Call!
オハラの悲劇! バスターコールの恐怖
